item.title: Defection row adds new twist in Gadwal municipality
item.description:
<![CDATA[Gadwal: Political activity has intensified in Gadwal following a fractured mandate in the recent municipal elections, setting the stage for a high-stakes contest for the Chairperson and Vice-Chairperson posts scheduled for Monday.
With no party securing a clear majority in the 37-member municipal council, intense lobbying, strategic negotiations and camp politics have come to the fore. The “magic figure” required to win the Chairperson post stands at 19.
The results are as follows: Indian Nati...]]>
item.author: The Hans India
